mapper.select: SELECT itemId, i.productId, image, description, title, price, isSoldout, likeCnt quantity FROM ITEM i, PRODUCT p WHERE p.productId = i.productId AND i.productId = #{value}
select itemId, productId, image, description, title, price, isSoldout, likeCnt, quantity FROM ITEM WHERE lower(title) like '%'||#{value}||'%'
SELECT itemId, productId, image, description, title, price, isSoldout, likeCnt, quantity FROM ITEM WHERE itemId = #{itemId}

SELECT i.itemId AS itemId, i.productId AS productId, i.image AS image, i.description AS description, i.title AS title, i.price AS price, i.isSoldout AS isSoldout, i.likeCnt AS likeCnt, i.quantity AS quantity, NVL(w.wishlistId, 0) AS isInWishlist, NVL(c.cartItemId, 0) AS isInCart FROM ITEM i, WISHLIST w, CARTITEM c WHERE i.itemId = w.itemId(+) AND i.itemId = c.itemId(+) AND w.memberId(+) = #{memberId} AND i.productId = #{productId} AND i.isSoldout = 0 ORDER BY likeCnt DESC
